current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To amend the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 to strengthen  Fourth and Fifth Amendment protections and freedoms of citizens of the United States and ensure greater transparency and oversight of the ability of the Federal Government to collect information and conduct surveillance on the private lives of citizens of the United States.
